summary: Mountain texture replacer with parallax and moss 2K
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][b][size=5][b][size=5][b][size=5]UPDATE! 2016-04-23 Added an alternate mountainslab01 and mountainslab02 with the vanilla textures overlayed. See screens![/size][/b][/size][/b]

UPDATE! 2016-03-29 Mossfall.dds (overlaying moss texture) that I failed to add earlier has been added.[/size][/b]

UPDATE! 2016-03-28 Optional, colorcorrected LOD's added for the mountains.[/size][/b]


This is a reworked version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63847/?]Northfire's Mountains with parallax 2K[/url] with all new normals, more color diversity and moss overlay. I'm going to let the screenshots talk for them selves. :) 

Install: unpack content into your main Skyrim directory (dont forgett to make backups if you need to) or just use your mod manager of choice. Important! Use only one of the moss esp's!

[size=4]The mod is a retexture of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58960/?]Tamriel Reloaded - Mountains and Rocks[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/139369]32cm[/url].[/size]
[size=4]Mosses are a retexture of the moss rocks mod from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/?]The Ruffled Feather[/url] by SparrowPrince.[/size]

Additional mods used in the screenshots:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67387/?]Northfire's Dungeons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70729/?]Northfire's Dirtcliffs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66971/?]Dark Fantasy Overhaul[/url] - with customised textures
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67478/?]Unbelievable Grass Two[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36780/?]West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage[/url] - with customised textures
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics
[/url]

My own ENB.
My own customised Imperial Forts based on Tamriel Reloaded HD, Vivid Landscapes and Amidianborns mods.
My own skin textures.

[youtube]FonTtBHksIo[/youtube]
author: SgtPetterzon
